name: World Renders
tag_list: translations, translators-office, translator, translation-agency, document-translation, russian-translation, spanish-translation
overview:
World Renders is the ultimate translation agency. All translators are native and all translations are revised and corrected (if needed) by a second translator for guaranteeing the best result.

World Renders works under a powerful state-of-the-art order and quote management platform. The system is unique in the world and it has been designed and developed for bringing the most powerful and easy tool for calculating the price instantly and make orders efficiently.

World Renders works this way:

1 - The customer enters World Renders’ website. Since the first seccond the customer can find a tool for calculating the price for a translation order.

2 - The customer chooses the document that wants to get translated.

3 - The customer selects the original language of the document and the language in which wants to have it translated.

4 - Right after clicking on “Calculate” the price is shown.

5 - On this point the customer may confirm the order or come back later.

As soon as the order is confirmed, a project manager will asign the work to a native translator in the target language for performing the translation and once it is done a second translator will revise it and corret it if needed.

World Renders is used to work from small to large projects, and guarantees the most accurate translation in all cases.

The customer care service is another of the big priorities at World Renders. Satisfaction is guaranteed, before, during and after making an order. All messages, emails and phone calls are answered professionaly and very fast.
